pullrequest.title: use CMAKE_INSTALL_LIBDIR in pkg-config example test in case an arch-dependent lib folder is used

content.raw:
the test passes in the debbuilder, and the pipeline (and my local machine), but it fails on our jenkins xenial machine:

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_cmake-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64&build=78)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_cmake-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64/78/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_cmake-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64/78/testReport/junit/(root)/core_child_requires_core_no_deps/make/
